commit message: Make tests pass on a device (delays)
Adding checks to Backup/Restore and Widget
Fixed account credentials lost during upgrade
Changes in backup format. Fix for date formatting

Commands, which don't require Internet connection, are executed without
connection.
Added messages notifier extracted.
Refactoring: Commands queue Notifier extracted from MyService

Added events to notify a User about sync progress.
task 63: Indicator when AndStatus is syncing
http://github.com/andstatus/andstatus/issues/issue/63

Fixed Avatars downloading - task 39: Showing avatar pictures
http://github.com/andstatus/andstatus/issues/issue/39

Smarter indicator - task 63: Indicator when AndStatus is syncing
http://github.com/andstatus/andstatus/issues/issue/63

Added an option to change Connection timeout. task 83: Client causes
several duplicate posts
http://github.com/andstatus/andstatus/issues/issue/83
Added localization to the text of the Syncing indicator
Fix Switch between Internal and External storage (No unit tests yet)
Overflow button styled well for API >= 11

Overflow button added to the other Action bars. It is visible is the
Activity reports that it has an Options menu.
Automatic syncing state of account preserved during backup/restore

Fixed failing commands repeating too often. Error queue intorduced.
Still error in the new MyServiceTest
Fixed lack of multithreading using android.os.AsyncTask
Fixed fetching timeline. More tests written.
Fixed unnecessary delays in commands queue processing

BOOT_COMPLETED permission added in order to update widget after boot.
MyService tests passed, at last.
Adjusted layout of Action bar buttons
Fixed sync adapter not reporting errors for failed accounts

Fixed: syncing in foreground.
Added: Suggestion database is being moved also, when moving between
external and internal storage.
Changed: Dynamic OAuth keys are per Origin, not per OriginType as
before.
Data pruning occurs only in foreground and not more than once in a day
Fixed text on 'combined/at/for' button. Fixed DataPruner test.
Help activity style is made close to the style of other screens
Layouts fixed: overflow button is larger and easier to click.
Don't prune data right after data restored from a Backup.
Fixed Restore button visible after upgrade.

Workaround for task 92: Cannot add new Twitter account for Android
before 4.2 (before API 17)
http://github.com/andstatus/andstatus/issues/issue/92

Fixed: If you tried to send update while offline, the update was lost.
Now it is put into retry queue.
